creditline: Gift of Mrs. Mary Cullen in honor of Dennis Adrian and Richard Born
description: color reproduction of a painting of a drawing room scene; two women gathered at a table with a man standing nearby, with two other women seated on a bench at R; artist has altered the image, adding ink faces onto the existing figures; added a black ink figure on bench at R, and other figures near C of image; intentional ink marks and surface damages
medium: Color lithograph with ink and pigment
provenance: Mary Cullen, Houston (until 2016); given to MIA.
title: Study for "The Salon"
